caa2365cf9d5d80d62099e3456c9e0b2.title: Thai Cooking Class from makebistro
caa2365cf9d5d80d62099e3456c9e0b2.description: Learn the art of traditional Thai cooking with Derek Lucci of makebistro. You’ll explore the techniques, ingredients, and tools that create Thailand’s unique regional cuisines – including how to balance Thai food’s spicy, sour, sweet, and salty flavors to make delicious dishes that are hard to find in the U.S. Known for his popular Thai supper club and instructional Instagram videos, Derek will help you have fun in the kitchen and make meals that you can share with loved ones.

charity.description: Help women immigrants who make amazing breads from their home countries become business owners.

charity.name: Waterwheel
charity.description: The WaterWheel Foundation chooses non-profits from a large sphere of needs including social services, primarily those benefitting women and children; environmental, with a focus on clean water and land conservation with public access; as well as food banks, urban gardening and the like. Thanks to the generosity of the fans, since its creation WaterWheel’s Touring Division has donated over $1,000,000 to more than 425 groups.

1df540043347f5df38a3240342ada1c2.title: Thai Yoga Therapy - 7-Day Program
1df540043347f5df38a3240342ada1c2.description:
Thai Yoga Therapy is an intelligent and graceful healing method that integrates assisted yoga stretching and acupressure. More commonly known as "Thai massage," the practitioner essentially "gives yoga" TO the receiver, while they lay passively. Quite unlike and far superior to any other bodywork you've received, Thai Yoga Therapy gets the body moving in all directions to heal the internal system. 

While our culture has branded bodywork as a quick fix for acute back or neck pain, Thai Yoga Therapy effectively treats chronic pain and other health problems when received regularly. The 7-Day Therapeutic Program is seven Thai Yoga sessions, scheduled 1-2 times per week, each session focusing on a different physical attitude. 

Sessions take place in the clients home or in my Park Slope or Gramercy studio locations.

50% of these proceeds will go directly to hurricane relief for the Caribbean.

ac9bd5ec830197693b93cc1bb86a5480.title: Purpose Mapping
ac9bd5ec830197693b93cc1bb86a5480.description:
Purpose Mapping is the #1 methodology for clarifying your purpose, activating your full potential and making a meaningful contribution in the world. 

As Executive Director of the Purpose Genome Institute, Craig Filek uses Purpose Mapping to guide executives, entrepreneurs, investors & professionals around the world. 

By the end of your 75-minute Skype session, you'll know who you are, why you're here and most importantly... what to do next. 

100% of the funds raised will go to Mankind Project, a global community of men initiating men into the sacred masculine. www.mankindproject.org

charity.name: Mankind Project
charity.description: Support a global network of free peer-facilitated men's groups and supports men in leading lives of integrity, authenticity, and service.

72c5ab4dd5bd5531fe3cdaf65d1ae395.title: Basic Introduction to Javascript
72c5ab4dd5bd5531fe3cdaf65d1ae395.description:
I will give you a solid basic introduction to the most popular Programming Language in the world.

Why Javascript?
* Its Popular, so plenty of community support, you will be feel at home.
* Its fun. Programmers in other language will like you
* Easy to learn. You just need a web browser to start learning

Whether you already know programming or just starting out as a complete noob, you will learn one or two things that will get your ready for your journey to be productive in javascript.

We will go through the core constructs of the language:
1. Variables
2. Data Types
3. Operators and funtions

We will NOT learn Javascript  the Web in this introduction.

We will learn together in a 2 hour session via skype or a screen share tool.

bb6aaf78c00b4d7ad67b27ff85635ac1.title: One Private Yin Yoga Lesson
bb6aaf78c00b4d7ad67b27ff85635ac1.description:
Yin Yoga is a quiet, relaxing, and meditative style of yoga in which the practitioner sinks deeply into floor-based postures in order to target the connective tissue, heal the internal organs, and release emotions. 

In this ninety minute private lesson, certified Yin yoga teacher Emily Sussell will guide you through a series of deep stretches and facilitate the process of tailoring the shapes to your body to maximize benefits.

Sessions are by appointment and take place in your home or at Emily's Gramercy or Park Slope studio locations.

Fifty percent of the proceeds will go to charities that support animal rights.

ce221787bc244e5eb5b7de96db323a4c.title: Creative Brainstorming Session
ce221787bc244e5eb5b7de96db323a4c.description:
Anthony David Adams, BakeSale co-founder,patent-holding inventor, peak performance coach and professional brainstormer is offering YOU the same creative insights he has been hired to share with organizations like The United Nations, BMW and the Salvation Army. 

Unlocked deeper creativity and learn how to better harness your creative potential. Can be delivered onsite in NYC or remotely via Skype. 90 Minutes.

c51cebc50bb0c5bc712efb127b7bd61b.title: Make your website's home page look good on small devices
c51cebc50bb0c5bc712efb127b7bd61b.description:
Do you have a website that’s not usable on mobile screens? I can fix that for you using responsive design.

I’ll redo the website’s home page to perform better on all devices. This includes responsiveness in both look and delivery.

I have over 20 years experience designing and building sites for the web.
